title: map2d with rectangular view
shortDescription: How to render a Map2D with a RectangularVisibilityArea
description:
This demo shows how to use a `Map2D`. Use the W, A, S, and D keys to scroll the map.

A `RectangularVisibilityArea` is used as the visibilitor, and `RepeatingTilesProvoder` is used as the tile ID provider.
